traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The naga is a 5th-level spellcaster (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks) that needs only verbal components to cast its spells. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence, and it has the following wizard spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): mage hand, minor illusion, ray of frost * 1st level (4 slots): charm person, sleep * 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, hold person * 3rd level (2 slots): lightning bolt

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.
